{2}, Sacrifice Prophetic Crystal: Draw a card.
Blight {3}{U}{U}. You may cast Prophetic Crystal for its blight cost as though it had flash. [i](You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {3}{U}{U}. If you do, it enters under an opponent's control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2: When Prophet of Crystals enters, return target spell and another target creature you control to their owner's hand.
